title: 50 KM AWAY VAIKO WAVES BLACK FLAG FROM A BALCONY WHERE HE WAS ARRESTED
content: Onlanka News – by Walter Jayawardhana Marumalarchi Dravida Munnetra Kazagam outfit’s leader Vaiko and 750 odd party workers were arrested by Madhya |Pradesh police as the South Indian rabble rouser’s followers were burning effigies of Mahinda Rajapaksa and waving black flags outside a Dharmasala a guest house where they were detained for two dates for…
